works.description:
Significant portion of our article is copied. For example as follow;

(Please note: They are in very small letters at the center of the webpages)

Equity shares: These shares are also known as ordinary shares. They are the shares which do not enjoy any preference regarding payment of dividend and repayment of capital. They are given dividend at a fluctuating rate.

Preference shares: These shares are those shares which are given preference as regards to payment of dividend and repayment of capital. They do not enjoy normal voting rights. 

Bonus shares: The word bonus means a gift given free of charge. Bonus shares are those shares which are issued by the company free of charge as bonus to the shareholders. 

And so on copied...
The article at the infringing location is a word by word copy of our original article.
